p: It is worth mentioning the beneficial role-played by the enzyme activities that are upregulated by UPR signaling. Two studies showed that alpha-glucosidase inhibitors Celgosivir (an iminosugar) and Castanospermine can inhibit DENV production via inhibition of ER-resident alpha-glucosidase in primary human macrophages a Huh-7 and BHK-21 cells, respectively [ 233, 234].
